COMMENT_TX: ej,mitck001,P,davib902,Charging mound after HBP $Bruce Hurst knocked down Kevin Mitchell with the first pitch; Mitchell glared at Hurst and the two exchanged words; Mitchell stared towards the mound but HP umpire Bob Davidson stopped Mitchell; both benches emptied but order was quickly restored; Hurst hit Mitchell with the next pitch; Mitchell charged the mound, knocked down Hurst and was tackled by Fred McGriff; both benches emptied again; Mitchell was ejected by Davidson
